quote: If you want to change how you see your problems, you have to change what you value and/or how you measure failure/success. – Mark Manson
fact: Studies have shown that children laugh an average of 300 times/day and adults 17 times/day, making the average child more optimistic, curious, and creative than the adult.
joke: Where do you learn to make banana splits? At sundae school.
